name: TelePortals
description:
The idea of the game is you control two TelePorters who have 30 seconds to reach the end of the course or they fail. You're being watched through a television, which is why it's so grainy. Enjoy!

Game Controls

Keyboard

Move - WASD / IJKL
Shoot Portal - E / U
Drop Object - Q / O

XBox Controller

Move - Left Joystick / Right Joystick
Shoot Portal - Left Trigger / Right Trigger
Drop Object - Left Bumper / Right Bumper

Menu

Navigate - WASD / Arrows / Mouse / Left Joystick
Back - Click with Mouse / ESC / B (controller)
